00049 void CDFData::Clear()
00050 {
00051         genericData.Header().Clear();
00052         setTocMetaData = false;
00053         mode = NoMode;
00054 
00055         curIndex = 0;
00056         curGroupFilePos = 0;
00057 
00058         if (tocDataSet)
00059         {
00060                 tocDataSet->Delete();
00061                 tocDataSet = 0;
00062         }
00063 
00064         nameToFilePosMap.clear();
00065 }

00087 void CDFData::SetRefSequence(const std::string &seq)
00088 {
00089         GenericDataHeader* gPtr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00090         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00091         paramType.SetName(CDF_REFSEQ_PARAM);
00092         paramType.SetValueAscii(seq);
00093         gPtr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00094 }
00095 
00096 std::string CDFData::GetRefSequence()
00097 {
00098         std::string result;
00099         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00100         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00101         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(CDF_REFSEQ_PARAM, paramType))
00102         {
00103                 result = paramType.GetValueAscii();
00104         }
00105         return result;
00106 }

00123 void CDFData::SetProbeSetCnt(u_int32_t cnt, CDFDataTypeIds type)
00124 {

00126         SetUInt32ToGenericHdr(CDF_SETS_PARAM, cnt);

00128 
00129 void CDFData::SetDataTypeId(CDFDataTypeIds p, int32_t probesetCnt)
00130 {
00131         GenericDataHeader* gPtr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00132         std::string typeId;
00133         std::wstring groupName;
00134         if(p == Expression)
00135         {
00136                 typeId = AFFY_EXPR_PS;
00137                 groupName = CDF_PS_GROUP_LBL;
00138         }
00139         else if(p == Genotyping)
00140         {
00141                 typeId = AFFY_GENO_PS;
00142                 groupName = CDF_PS_GROUP_LBL;
00143         }
00144         else if(p == Tag)
00145         {
00146                 typeId = AFFY_TAG_PS;
00147                 groupName = CDF_PS_GROUP_LBL;
00148         }
00149         else if(p == Resequencing)
00150         {
00151                 typeId = AFFY_RESEQ_PS;
00152                 groupName = CDF_PS_GROUP_LBL;
00153         }
00154         else 
00155         {
00156                 typeId = AFFY_CNTRL_PS;
00157                 groupName = CDF_QC_GROUP_LBL;
00158         }
00159         gPtr->SetFileTypeId(typeId);
00160         CreateDataGroups(groupName, probesetCnt);
00161 }
00162 
00163 std::string CDFData::GetDataTypeId()
00164 {
00165         GenericDataHeader* gPtr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00166         return gPtr->GetFileTypeId();
00167 }
00168 
00169 void CDFData::CreateDataGroups(const std::wstring& p, int32_t probesetCnt)
00170 {
00171         CreateContentsGroup(p, probesetCnt);
00172         CreateProbeSetGroups(probesetCnt);
00173 }
00174 
00175 void CDFData::CreateContentsGroup(const std::wstring& p, int32_t probesetCnt)
00176 {
00177         DataGroupHeader c(p);
00178         DataSetHeader dp;
00179         dp.SetRowCnt(probesetCnt);
00180         dp.SetName(p);
00181         dp.AddUnicodeColumn(L"", MAX_CDF_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH);
00182         dp.AddIntColumn(L"");
00183         c.AddDataSetHdr(dp);
00184         genericData.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(c);
00185 }
00186 
00187 void CDFData::CreateProbeSetGroups(int32_t probesetCnt)
00188 {
00189         for(int i = 0; i < probesetCnt; i++)
00190         {
00191                 DataGroupHeader c;
00192                 genericData.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(c);
00193         }
00194 }

00196 u_int32_t CDFData::GetUInt32FromGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name)
00197 {
00198         int32_t result = 0;
00199         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00200         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00201         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(name, paramType))
00202         {
00203                 result = paramType.GetValueUInt32();
00204         }
00205         return result;
00206 }
00207 
00208 void CDFData::SetUInt32ToGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name, u_int32_t value)
00209 {
00210         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00211         paramType.SetName(name);
00212         paramType.SetValueUInt32(value);
00213         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00214         hdr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00215 }

00217 void CDFData::PrepareForSequentialAccess()
00218 {
00219         // set the mode
00220         mode = SequentialMode;
00221 
00222         // skip-over the first DataGroup
00223         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(genericData.Header().GetFirstDataGroupFilePos());
00224         curGroupFilePos = dg.Header().GetNextGroupPos();
00225 
00226         // initialize the curPos
00227         curIndex = 0;
00228 }
00229 
00230 void CDFData::PrepareForAccessByProbeSetIndex()
00231 {
00232         // set the mode
00233         mode = ProbeSetIndexMode;
00234 
00235         // Open the first DataGroup
00236         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(genericData.Header().GetFirstDataGroupFilePos());
00237 
00238         // Open the first DataSet
00239         if (tocDataSet)
00240                 tocDataSet->Delete();
00241         tocDataSet = dg.DataSet(0);
00242         if (tocDataSet)
00243                 tocDataSet->Open();
00244 }
00245 
00246 void CDFData::PrepareForAccessByProbeSetName()
00247 {
00248         // set the mode
00249         mode = ProbeSetNameMode;
00250 
00251         // Open the first DataGroup
00252         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(genericData.Header().GetFirstDataGroupFilePos());
00253 
00254         // Open the first DataSet
00255         if (tocDataSet)
00256                 tocDataSet->Delete();
00257         tocDataSet = dg.DataSet(0);
00258         if (tocDataSet)
00259         {
00260                 if (tocDataSet->Open())
00261                 {
00262 
00263                         // build the name-file position map
00264                         int32_t rows = tocDataSet->Rows();
00265 
00266                         std::wstring probeSetName;
00267                         u_int32_t filePos = 0;
00268 
00269                         for (int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row)
00270                         {
00271                                 tocDataSet->GetData(row, TOCProbeSetNameCol, probeSetName);
00272                                 tocDataSet->GetData(row, TOCFilePosCol, filePos);
00273 
00274                                 nameToFilePosMap[probeSetName] = filePos;
00275                         }
00276                 }
00277         }
00278 }

00280 /*
00281  */
00282 void CDFData::GetProbeSetInformation(int32_t index, CDFProbeSetInformation& info)
00283 {
00284         if (GetDataTypeId() == AFFY_CNTRL_PS)
00285         {
00286                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00287                 throw e;
00288         }
00289 
00290         if (index >= genericData.Header().GetNumDataGroups()-1)
00291         {
00292                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00293                 throw e;
00294         }
00295 
00296         if (mode == SequentialMode)
00297         {
00298                 if (index == curIndex)
00299                 {
00300                         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(curGroupFilePos);
00301                         info.SetDataGroup(dg);
00302 
00303                         // Move to the next data group
00304                         ++curIndex;
00305                         curGroupFilePos = dg.Header().GetNextGroupPos();
00306                 }
00307                 else
00308                 {
00309                         CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException e;
00310                         throw e;
00311                 }
00312         }
00313         else if (mode == ProbeSetIndexMode)
00314         {
00315                 u_int32_t filePos = GetTOCFilePosByIndex(index);
00316                 DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(filePos);
00317                 info.SetDataGroup(dg);
00318         }
00319         else
00320         {
00321                 CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException e;
00322                 throw e;
00323         }
00324 }
00325 
00326 void CDFData::GetProbeSetInformation(const std::wstring& probeSetName, CDFProbeSetInformation& info)
00327 {
00328         if (GetDataTypeId() == AFFY_CNTRL_PS)
00329         {
00330                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00331                 throw e;
00332         }
00333 
00334         if (mode != ProbeSetNameMode)
00335         {
00336                 CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException e;
00337                 throw e;
00338         }
00339 
00340         u_int32_t filePos = GetTOCFilePosByName(probeSetName);
00341         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(filePos);
00342         info.SetDataGroup(dg);
00343 }

00345 
00346 void CDFData::GetQCProbeSetInformation(int32_t index, CDFQCProbeSetInformation& info)
00347 {
00348         if (GetDataTypeId() != AFFY_CNTRL_PS)
00349         {
00350                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00351                 throw e;
00352         }
00353 
00354         if (index >= genericData.Header().GetNumDataGroups()-1)
00355         {
00356                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00357                 throw e;
00358         }
00359 
00360         if (mode == SequentialMode)
00361         {
00362                 if (index == curIndex)
00363                 {
00364                         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(curGroupFilePos);
00365                         DataSet* ds = dg.DataSet(0);
00366                         info.SetDataSet(ds);
00367 
00368                         // Move to the next data group
00369                         ++curIndex;
00370                         curGroupFilePos = dg.Header().GetNextGroupPos();
00371                 }
00372                 else
00373                 {
00374                         CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException e;
00375                         throw e;
00376                 }
00377         }
00378         else if (mode == ProbeSetIndexMode)
00379         {
00380                 u_int32_t filePos = GetTOCFilePosByIndex(index);
00381                 DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(filePos);
00382                 DataSet* ds = dg.DataSet(0);
00383                 info.SetDataSet(ds);
00384         }
00385         else
00386         {
00387                 CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException e;
00388                 throw e;
00389         }
00390 }
00391 
00392 void CDFData::GetQCProbeSetInformation(const std::wstring& probeSetName, CDFQCProbeSetInformation& info)
00393 {
00394         if (GetDataTypeId() != AFFY_CNTRL_PS)
00395         {
00396                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00397                 throw e;
00398         }
00399 
00400         if (mode != ProbeSetNameMode)
00401         {
00402                 CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException e;
00403                 throw e;
00404         }
00405 
00406         u_int32_t filePos = GetTOCFilePosByName(probeSetName);
00407         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(filePos);
00408         DataSet* ds = dg.DataSet(0);
00409         info.SetDataSet(ds);
00410 }
00411 
00412 u_int32_t CDFData::GetTOCFilePosByIndex(int32_t index)
00413 {
00414         if (tocDataSet == 0 || tocDataSet->IsOpen() == false)
00415         {
00416                 DataSetNotOpenException e;
00417                 throw e;
00418         }
00419 
00420         u_int32_t filePos = (u_int32_t)-1;
00421         tocDataSet->GetData(index, TOCFilePosCol, filePos);
00422         return filePos;
00423 }
00424 
00425 u_int32_t CDFData::GetTOCFilePosByName(const std::wstring& name)
00426 {
00427         if (tocDataSet == 0 || tocDataSet->IsOpen() == false)
00428         {
00429                 DataSetNotOpenException e;
00430                 throw e;
00431         }
00432 
00433         std::map<std::wstring, u_int32_t>::iterator ii = nameToFilePosMap.find(name);
00434         if (ii == nameToFilePosMap.end())
00435         {
00436                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00437                 throw e;
00438         }
00439         else
00440                 return ii->second;
00441 }
00442 
00443 std::wstring CDFData::GetProbeSetName(int32_t index)
00444 {
00445         // Access the TOC data set
00446         if (tocDataSet == 0)
00447         {
00448                 DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(genericData.Header().GetFirstDataGroupFilePos());
00449                 tocDataSet = dg.DataSet(0);
00450 
00451                 if (tocDataSet == 0)
00452                 {
00453                         DataSetNotOpenException e;
00454                         throw e;
00455                 }
00456         }
00457         // Open the TOC data set if not open
00458         if (tocDataSet->IsOpen() == false)
00459         {
00460                 tocDataSet->Open();
00461                 if (tocDataSet->IsOpen() == false)
00462                 {
00463                         DataSetNotOpenException e;
00464                         throw e;
00465                 }
00466         }
00467         
00468         if (index < 0 || index >= tocDataSet->Rows())
00469         {
00470                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00471                 throw e;
00472         }
00473 
00474         std::wstring probeSetName;
00475         tocDataSet->GetData(index, TOCProbeSetNameCol, probeSetName);
00476         return probeSetName;
00477 }
